description: Osprey Games has shared details on the creation of “Undaunted 2200: Callisto,” a new standalone game in the Undaunted series, which is out next week This new entry introduces gameplay on Jupiter’s moon Callisto, where players engage in tactical operations to secure high ground and vital resources using mechs and vehicles. The development of “Undaunted...
title: Undaunted 2200: Callisto Set for Launch Next Week

description: Steamforged Games has expanded its offerings for Warmachine players with new models and units for the Cryx Necrofactorium. The update includes the Malefactor Heavy Warjack, which features a modular weapons loadout that allows for customizable offensive and defensive strategies. This model includes an integrated Aggressive ability, enabling it to run or charge without the need...
title: Steamforged Games Releases New Units for Cryx Necrofactorium in Warmachine

description: Limithron, creator of the acclaimed Pirate Borg RPG, is launching a new Kickstarter campaign titled “Down Among the Dead” on September 17th. The campaign is aiming to enrich Pirate Borg and 5E gameplay with new expansions and accessories. The Kickstarter will introduce the Pirate Borg Starter Set and an adventure anthology titled “Down Among the...
title: Limithron to Set Sail with “Down Among the Dead” Kickstarter, Expanding the Pirate Borg Universe on September 17th

description: Later this month, Burnin Fish Games, known for “Kitten Casualty,” is preparing to introduce a new card game titled “Who Murdered the Turtle?” via Kickstarter. The murder mystery game combines elements of strategy, teamwork, and deception, challenging players to uncover the murderer among them or be the last turtle standing. In “Who Murdered the Turtle?”...
title: Burnin Fish Games Set to Launch “Who Murdered the Turtle?” on Kickstarter

description: Reggie Games, known for their monster-hunting board game “Primal: The Awakening,” is poised to launch the Primal Boutique Store on September 17th. The new Primal Boutique Store is designed to be the definitive shopping destination for all things related to “Primal,” providing fans with the unique opportunity to purchase the game and future content directly...
title: Reggie Games Set to Open Primal Boutique Store, Offering an Exclusive Shopping Experience for “Primal: The Awakening” Fans

description: Chaosium Inc has introduced a new scenario for their Rivers of London roleplaying game titled “The Font of All Evil.” This 44-page standalone scenario draws inspiration from Ben Aaronovitch’s urban fantasy novels and serves as an introductory adventure for players. “The Font of All Evil” sets players on a murder investigation in Ealing, West London....
title: Chaosium Inc Releases New Scenario for Rivers of London RPG: “The Font of All Evil”

description: Just when you thought every possible theme had been squeezed into a MONOPOLY board, The Op Games pulls a fast one with a brand-new culinary twist: MONOPOLY: Flavortown Edition. Available now at $44.99, this game drags the classic board game into the kitchen of none other than Guy Fieri himself. You’ve seen him on TV,...
title: MONOPOLY Takes a Trip to Flavortown—Yes, You Read That Right
